text: Asclepias eriocarpa (also known as the woollypod milkweed) is a species of milkweed plant. It is also known as Indian Milkweed and Kotolo. It is in the subfamily Asclepiadoideae. It is native to the western United States. This species is found in dry, barren habitats. ==Other websites== *Asclepias eriocarpa at USDA PLANT Database *Asclepias eriocarpa at Treatment from the Jepson Manual e
title: Asclepias eriocarpa
